ingredients: 1 tsp hot chili powder (or to taste depending on how hot you like your curries)
2 oz (approx 55 g) butter or margerine-style spread (as long as it is suitable for cooking)
4 scallions – spring onions (cut into 1 inch pieces)
1 large green bell pepper – or use a red one if you prefer (sliced)
1 inch cube of fresh root ginger (finely chopped)
